content: Yes, many fans feel that Disney did not properly consult the original creators or respect the legacy of the franchise when making changes. However, it is worth noting that Disney did involve some of the original creators in the process, such as bringing back Mark Hamill, Harrison Ford, and Carrie Fisher for the new movies. Additionally, it is common for creative decisions to be subject to different interpretations and judgments, and what one fan might consider to be a betrayal of the original franchise might be seen differently by others. Nonetheless, it is understandable that some fans may feel frustrated by the changes made to the Star Wars franchise.
